sentences.sContent: The cycle of geosyncline formation and orogeny can be integrated with the plate tectonics concept of opening and closing oceans in a simple and natural way.
sentences.sContent_eng: The cycle of geosyncline formation and orogeny can be integrated with the plate tectonics concept of opening and closing oceans in a simple and natural way.
sentences.sCn: 这种地槽的形成与造山作用的循环可以以一种简单和自然的方式与板块构造的海洋开合理论结合起来。

synos.tran: [地质]造山运动，造山作用；山岳的形成

phrases.pCn: 喜马拉雅运动；喜马拉雅造山运动

words.tran: 山狱论；[地理] 山岳志；[地理] 山岳形态学
